text: Andrzej Kowalski (1930 in Sosnowiec – 2004) was a Polish painter and graphics artist. From 1949 to 1955, he attended the Cracow Academy of Fine Arts. He became director of the studio of painting and drawing at the Academy of Fine Arts in Katowice. ==References== ==External links== * Akademia Sztuk Pięknych w Katowicach Category:1930 births Category:2004 deaths Category:20th-century Polish painters Category:20th-century male artists Category:21st-century Polish painters Category:21st-century male artists Category:People from Sosnowiec Category:Polish male painters
